mapper.sql: acf.cfg_file_id, acf.app_id, acf.file_name, acf.ext, acf.deploy_path, acf.nexus_repository, acf.nexus_directory, acf.nexus_asset_id, acf.create_time, acf.md5
mapper.insert: insert into app_cfg_file(app_id, file_name, ext, deploy_path, nexus_repository, nexus_directory, nexus_asset_id, create_time, md5) values (#{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deployPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexusRepository,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexusDirectory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexusAssetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_cfg_file set ext = #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deploy_path = #{deployPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nexus_repository = #{nexusRepository,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nexus_directory = #{nexusDirectory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nexus_asset_id = #{nexusAssetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cfg_file_id = #{cfgFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
